description: This file defines platform-specific cryptographic functions for the IEEE 1905.1/1a stack, including functions for randomness, Diffie-Hellman key generation, SHA256 hashing, HMAC, and AES encryption/decryption. It also contains macro definitions and includes relevant headers.

methods.name: PLATFORM_GET_RANDOM_BYTES
methods.description: Fills a buffer with random bytes and returns success status.

methods.name: PLATFORM_GENERATE_DH_KEY_PAIR
methods.description: Generates a Diffie-Hellman key pair (private and public keys).

methods.name: PLATFORM_COMPUTE_DH_SHARED_SECRET
methods.description: Computes Diffie-Hellman shared secret using local private key and remote public key.

methods.name: PLATFORM_SHA256
methods.description: Computes SHA256 digest of concatenated input elements.

methods.name: PLATFORM_HMAC_SHA256
methods.description: Computes HMAC-SHA256 of the input data with the provided key.

methods.name: PLATFORM_AES_ENCRYPT
methods.description: Encrypts data in-place using AES-128-CBC with provided IV.

methods.name: PLATFORM_AES_DECRYPT
methods.description: Decrypts data in-place using AES-128-CBC with provided IV.
